patthana12.17:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana12.17:0.3_0: It’s a shopkeeper, gentle, and swept away.
patthana12.17:2.1_0: for the sake of letting go, two results, together with the five results of deeds ...
patthana12.17:3.1_1: the teaching doesn’t go for refuge to the teaching. ...
patthana12.17:3.1_2: You don’t take refuge in the teaching ...
patthana12.17:4.1_0: for the sake of letting go, two results, together with the five results of deeds ...
